channel.title: Photography on The Grain Dance
channel.description: Recent content in Photography on The Grain Dance

item.title: First Pre-Wedding Session: a Fun, Scary, Workout
item.description: I’ve always wanted to shoot pre-wedding, but also I’ve been scared to offer my (admitredly amateur) servies. But the opportunity finally came, and here’s my story.

item.title: My (First) Journey Photographing Indoor Gig
item.description: When I heard that one of my favorite local shoegaze scene was going to do a gig promoting their new album, and they allowed cameras? I couldn’t skip this opportunity. One tiny problem though. It’s an indoor gig.
